Text: Download Hartmann if you're looking for anything on Obama's Chained CPI proposal. Randi will not mention it all. Guess what the topic is instead. Gun control....again.. ugh

I think Randi isn't talking about Chained CPI
because she knows it won't pass in the House.
Not because the Republicans care about raiding Social Security over the course of the next several years, but because the bill requires something they simply don't want :  tax cuts.   

So much for "grand" bargains.
